description: Try our easy to follow Colourful Greek Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Greek salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Colourful Greek Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice some wholegrain pitta into strips then bake in the oven at 180Â°C for 10 to 15 minutes or until crisp.
Combine some roughly chopped cucumber with a handful of quartered cherry tomatoes and a little sliced onion.
Shred and add a few sweet crunch lettuce leaves, crumble over a little feta cheese and season with a pinch of dried oregano, then pack in a sealable container.
Make a dressing with a drizzle of olive oil and a tiny drizzle of red wine vinegar, then pack into a sealed jar or bag for your child to pour over later. Jamie's
